description: Eastern redbud (Cercis canadensis 'Pauline Lily') is an amazing, small ornamental tree that blooms with stunning pink and white flowers every Spring. This deciduous species is easy to grow and maintain, thriving in a range of soil types and a variety of climates. The beautiful pink flowers that appear in the early Spring are a huge attraction for birds, bees, and other pollinators. Its heart shaped leaves turn a golden yellow hue in the fall, adding an additional pop of color to any landscape. Growing up to 20 feet tall, this small tree is perfect for any garden or yard, making it a great choice for those wanting to add a touch of beauty.
